vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a private-club bar on property zoned Subdistrict 3B within Planned Development District No. 830, the Bishop Arts Mixed Use District, at the southeast corner of North Madison Avenue and West 9th Street
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z201-352(MP)

Z201-352(MP)
